SorcererCantrips.Name: Acid Splash
SorcererCantrips.Description: You hurl a bubble of acid. Choose one creature within range, or choose two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other.

SorcererCantrips.Name: Chill Touch
SorcererCantrips.Description: You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range.

SorcererCantrips.Name: Dancing Lights
SorcererCantrips.Description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air.

SorcererCantrips.Name: Fire Bolt
SorcererCantrips.Description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range.

SorcererCantrips.Name: Light
SorcererCantrips.Description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension and make it shed bright light.

SorcererCantrips.Name: Mage Hand
SorcererCantrips.Description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. You can use your action to control the hand.

SorcererCantrips.Name: Mending
SorcererCantrips.Description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch.

SorcererCantrips.Name: Message
SorcererCantrips.Description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message that only the target can hear.

SorcererCantrips.Name: Minor Illusion
SorcererCantrips.Description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration.

SorcererCantrips.Name: Poison Spray
SorcererCantrips.Description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm.

SorcererCantrips.Name: Prestidigitation
SorcererCantrips.Description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice.

SorcererCantrips.Name: Ray of Frost
SorcererCantrips.Description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range.

SorcererCantrips.Name: Shocking Grasp
SorcererCantrips.Description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch.

SorcererCantrips.Name: True Strike
SorcererCantrips.Description: You extend your hand and point a finger at a target in range, granting you brief insight into the target’s defenses.
